{"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":115181,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はい。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yes.\""},{"lineNumber":115182,"originalJapaneseLine":"　良ければランスさんも如何ですか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"If you'd like, Rance-san, would you like some too?\""},{"lineNumber":115183,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うむ、じゃあそうするか。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm, then I'll have some.\""},{"lineNumber":115184,"originalJapaneseLine":"　お、ケーキもあるじゃないか、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh, there's cake too.\""},{"lineNumber":115185,"originalJapaneseLine":"　んぐんぐ、うん、美味い」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Mmm, mmm, yeah, it's delicious.\""},{"lineNumber":115186,"originalJapaneseLine":"「まあ、手づかみで……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Well, with your hands...\""},{"lineNumber":115187,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふふ、まだまだありますから、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hehe, there’s still plenty more,"},{"lineNumber":115188,"originalJapaneseLine":"　慌てないで下さいね」","translatedEnglishLine":"so don’t rush.\""},{"lineNumber":115189,"originalJapaneseLine":"「しかし、こんなところで何してたんだ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"But what were you doing in a place like this?\""},{"lineNumber":115190,"originalJapaneseLine":"「エルドーレ・小林著。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"'Eldore' by Kobayashi."},{"lineNumber":115191,"originalJapaneseLine":"　祈りの日曜日」","translatedEnglishLine":"'Sunday of Prayer'.\""},{"lineNumber":115192,"originalJapaneseLine":"「へ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Huh?\""},{"lineNumber":115193,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふふ、本のタイトルです。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hehe, that’s the title of the book."},{"lineNumber":115194,"originalJapaneseLine":"　詩集を読んでいました」","translatedEnglishLine":"I was reading a poetry collection.\""},{"lineNumber":115195,"originalJapaneseLine":"ちょこんと持っていた本をハウゼルが掲げる。","translatedEnglishLine":"Hauzel held up the book she was quietly holding."},{"lineNumber":115196,"originalJapaneseLine":"「良かったら、ランスさんも如何ですか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"If you'd like, Rance-san, would you like some too?\""},{"lineNumber":115197,"originalJapaneseLine":"「俺はいい。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I’m fine."},{"lineNumber":115198,"originalJapaneseLine":"　文字だけの本は眠くなる」","translatedEnglishLine":"Books with just text make me sleepy.\""},{"lineNumber":115199,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そうですか……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Is that so...\""},{"lineNumber":115200,"originalJapaneseLine":"ハウゼルはほんのりと残念そうだった。","translatedEnglishLine":"Hauzel looked slightly disappointed."},{"lineNumber":115201,"originalJapaneseLine":"（昼下がり、中庭で紅茶を飲みながら詩集とは……","translatedEnglishLine":"(In the afternoon, drinking tea in the courtyard while reading a poetry collection..."},{"lineNumber":115202,"originalJapaneseLine":"　本当にこんな奴いるんだな……）","translatedEnglishLine":"There really are people like this...)"},{"lineNumber":115203,"originalJapaneseLine":"（うーん、淑女だ……","translatedEnglishLine":"(Hmm, such a refined lady..."},{"lineNumber":115204,"originalJapaneseLine":"　俺の周りの女としては、","translatedEnglishLine":"Among the women around me,"},{"lineNumber":115205,"originalJapaneseLine":"　少し珍しいタイプな気がする）","translatedEnglishLine":"I feel she’s a somewhat rare type.)"},{"lineNumber":115206,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はあああっ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Haaah!\""},{"lineNumber":115207,"originalJapaneseLine":"（ふ、二人で……茶を飲んでる……）","translatedEnglishLine":"(Hmph, the two of them... drinking tea together...)"},{"lineNumber":115208,"originalJapaneseLine":"「？　どうしたの、サテラ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"? What’s wrong, Satera?\""},{"lineNumber":115209,"originalJapaneseLine":"「突然、大声出したりしてはしたないぞ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"It’s improper to suddenly shout out loud.\""},{"lineNumber":115210,"originalJapaneseLine":"「やっ、その、えと……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Uh, well, um...\""},{"lineNumber":115211,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふ、二人はその……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmph, the two of you are, um..."},{"lineNumber":115212,"originalJapaneseLine":"　仲……いいのか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"...close, aren’t you?\""},{"lineNumber":115213,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……へ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Huh?\""},{"lineNumber":115214,"originalJapaneseLine":"「まあ、別に悪かないが……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Well, I guess it’s not necessarily a bad thing...\""},{"lineNumber":115215,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ええ、そうですね」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yes, that’s right.\""},{"lineNumber":115216,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うくっ、ぬううう……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ugh, nuuuu...\""},{"lineNumber":115217,"originalJapaneseLine":"「さ、サテラも飲むぞ！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"C-come on, Satera, have some too!"},{"lineNumber":115218,"originalJapaneseLine":"　火炎、サテラにも淹れてくれ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Kaen, pour some for Satera as well!\""},{"lineNumber":115219,"originalJapaneseLine":"「？？　本当にどうしたの？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"?? What’s really wrong with you?\""},{"lineNumber":115220,"originalJapaneseLine":"「にぶちんです……ハウゼル様……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You're slow-witted... Hauzel-sama...\""},{"lineNumber":115221,"originalJapaneseLine":"「へ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Huh?\""},{"lineNumber":115222,"originalJapaneseLine":"「でも、そんなところも素敵ですー」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"But even that trait is wonderful—\""},{"lineNumber":115223,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ええ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Eh?\""},{"lineNumber":115224,"originalJapaneseLine":"ハウゼルはきょとんと首をかしげていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Hauzel tilted her head in confusion."},{"lineNumber":115225,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お、もう炊き出しの時間か」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh, it’s already time for the food distribution.\""},{"lineNumber":115226,"originalJapaneseLine":"野営地の一角にテントが作られ、","translatedEnglishLine":"A tent was set up in a corner of the camp,"},{"lineNumber":115227,"originalJapaneseLine":"兵達に食事が配られていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"and food was being distributed to the soldiers."},{"lineNumber":115228,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ランス様、どうしましょう。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Lord Rance, what shall we do?"},{"lineNumber":115229,"originalJapaneseLine":"　こちらでいただきますか？","translatedEnglishLine":"Shall we eat here?"},{"lineNumber":115230,"originalJapaneseLine":"　それとも何か作りますか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Or should we prepare something?\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 良ければランスさんも如何ですか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If you'd like, Rance-san, would you like some too?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お、ケーキもあるじゃないか、
「ふふ、まだまだありますから、
「しかし、こんなところで何してたんだ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "But what were you doing in a place like this?"
"Hehe, that’s the title of the book.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 詩集を読んでいました」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I was reading a poetry collection."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ちょこんと持っていた本をハウゼルが掲げる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hauzel held up the book she was quietly holding.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「良かったら、ランスさんも如何ですか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If you'd like, Rance-san, would you like some too?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 文字だけの本は眠くなる」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Books with just text make me sleepy."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ハウゼルはほんのりと残念そうだった。
（昼下がり、中庭で紅茶を飲みながら詩集とは……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (In the afternoon, drinking tea in the courtyard while reading a poetry collection...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 本当にこんな奴いるんだな……）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There really are people like this...)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺の周りの女としては、
少し珍しいタイプな気がする）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I feel she’s a somewhat rare type.)
(Hmph, the two of them... drinking tea together...)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「突然、大声出したりしてはしたないぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It’s improper to suddenly shout out loud."
"Hmph, the two of you are, um...
"Well, I guess it’s not necessarily a bad thing..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 火炎、サテラにも淹れてくれ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kaen, pour some for Satera as well!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「でも、そんなところも素敵ですー」
ハウゼルはきょとんと首をかしげていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hauzel tilted her head in confusion.
"Oh, it’s already time for the food distribution."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 野営地の一角にテントが作られ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A tent was set up in a corner of the camp,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 兵達に食事が配られていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and food was being distributed to the soldiers.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こちらでいただきますか？
それとも何か作りますか？」

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English
